locale.description: The desired language, consisting of an ISO 639 language code and an ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code, joined by an underscore. For example: es_MX, meaning 'Spanish (Mexico)'.

accept.description: It is used to set specified media type.

id.description: The Spotify category ID of the category.

href.description: A link to the Web API endpoint returning full details of the category.

category_id.description: The Spotify ID of the category you wish to fetch.

country.description: The country (an ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code)
